com.chap.links.client
Class Network.Options

java.lang.Object
  AbstractDrawOptions
      com.chap.links.client.Network.Options
Enclosing class:
Network
public static class Network.Options
extends AbstractDrawOptions

Options for drawing the Network. Create an instance via the method create, for example Network.Options options = Network.Options.create();

setNodesStyle

public final void setNodesStyle(java.lang.String style)
Set the default style for the nodes.

Parameters:
style - The default style for all nodes. Choose from "rect" (default), "circle", "database", "image", "text", "dot", "square", "triangle", "triangleDown", "star". This style can be overridden by a group style, or by a style of an individual node.

Set style for a group of nodes

Parameters:
groupName - Name for the group. All nodes with this groupName will get this font size

setGroupRadius

                                 double radius)
Set default radius for a group of nodes

Parameters:
groupName - Name for the group. All nodes with this groupName will get this font size
radius - Radius. Not applicable with styles rect, circle, database.
